koohiiStory1: This is a story about the end of the universe. The universe is turning into a featureless void. There´s nothing we can do about it except for throw a fiesta and frolic a little bit before it´s all over.
koohiiStory2: Sigfreid and Roy´s contract having been voided, the tiger is free to frolic about at the fiesta.
kunYomi: たわむ.れる、ざ.れる、じゃ.れる
words: tease, prank, trick, practical joke, mischief
to romp, to gambol, to frolic, to joke, to make fun of, to flirt
